scripts.test: export server_url=localhost && export socket_server=ws://localhost:3000 && export is_test=true && nodemon src/main.js
scripts.publish: sudo docker build -t 5scontrol/inference_server_js:v0.5.0 . --platform=linux/amd64 && sudo docker push 5scontrol/inference_server_js:v0.5.0
scripts.publish latest: sudo docker build -t 5scontrol/inference_server_js:latest . --platform=linux/amd64 && sudo docker push 5scontrol/inference_server_js:latest
